content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Add phishing simulations as a data source July 12, 2024 – You can now add Trend Vision One Phishing Simulations as a data source in the Threat and Exposure Management, which allows access to breach events from phishing simulations. For more information, see Configurating data sources. Cyber Risk Exposure Management → Threat and Exposure Management © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Add phishing simulations as a data source
